flavorText: In the face of extinction, the most perilous endeavors can be cause for hope.

foreignData.flavorText: Im Angesicht drohender Auslöschung kann selbst das risikoreichste Unterfangen Grund zur Hoffnung geben.
foreignData.name: Akoum-Flammensucherin
foreignData.text: Mitstreiter — {T}, tappe einen ungetappten Verbündeten, den du kontrollierst: Wirf eine Karte ab. Falls du dies tust, ziehe eine Karte.

foreignData.flavorText: A las puertas de la extinción, las empresas más peligrosas pueden ser un motivo de esperanza.
foreignData.name: Explorallamas de Akoum
foreignData.text: Secuaz — {T}, girar un Aliado enderezado que controlas: Descarta una carta. Si lo haces, roba una carta.

foreignData.flavorText: Face à l'extinction, les projets les plus périlleux peuvent faire naître l'espoir.
foreignData.name: Chercheuse de flammes d'Akoum
foreignData.text: Cohorte — {T}, engagez un allié dégagé que vous contrôlez : Défaussez-vous d'une carte. Si vous faites ainsi, piochez une carte.
foreignData.type: Créature : humain et shamane et allié

foreignData.flavorText: Dinanzi all'estinzione, le imprese più arrischiate possono alimentare speranze.
foreignData.name: Cercafiamme di Akoum
foreignData.text: Coorte — {T}, TAPpa un Alleato STAPpato che controlli: Scarta una carta. Se lo fai, pesca una carta.

foreignData.flavorText: 何かが消えてしまいそうなときには、最も危険な努力こそが希望の源になり得る。
foreignData.name: アクームの炎探し
foreignData.text: 盟友 ― {T}, あなたがコントロールするアンタップ状態の同盟者を１体タップする：カードを１枚捨てる。そうしたなら、カードを１枚引く。
foreignData.type: クリーチャー — 人間・シャーマン・同盟者

foreignData.flavorText: 절멸의 순간에는, 가장 위험한 행동이 희망의 씨앗이 될 수 있다.
foreignData.name: 아쿰 화염추적자
foreignData.text: 동료 — {T}, 당신이 조종하는 언탭된 동맹 한 개를 탭한다: 카드 한 장을 버린다. 그렇게 한다면, 카드 한 장을 뽑는다.

foreignData.flavorText: Face à extinção, as empreitadas mais arriscadas podem ser motivo de esperança.
foreignData.name: Buscachamas de Akoum
foreignData.text: Companheiro — {T}, Vire um Aliado desvirado que você controla: Descarte um card. Se fizer isso, compre um card.

foreignData.flavorText: Когда грозит неминуемая смерть, даже самое опасное предприятие может стать лучом надежды.
foreignData.name: Акумская Огнеискательница
foreignData.text: Когорта — {T}, поверните неповернутого Союзника под вашим контролем: сбросьте карту. Если вы это делаете, возьмите карту.

foreignData.flavorText: 在绝境中，最危险的行为也能成为希望所在。
foreignData.name: 阿库姆觅焰师
foreignData.text: 齐力～{T}，横置一个由你操控且未横置的伙伴：弃一张牌。若你如此作，则抓一张牌。

foreignData.flavorText: 在絕境中，最危險的行為也能成為希望所在。
foreignData.name: 阿庫姆覓焰師
foreignData.text: 齊力～{T}，橫置一個由你操控且未橫置的伙伴：棄一張牌。若你如此作，則抽一張牌。

name: Akoum Flameseeker
originalText: Cohort — {T}, Tap an untapped Ally you control: Discard a card. If you do, draw a card.

rulings.text: Discarding a card is part of the ability’s effect and isn’t optional. As the cohort ability resolves, if you have a card in your hand, you must discard one, even if the card you may have wanted to discard as you activated the ability is no longer in your hand.

To activate a cohort ability, the Ally with that ability must have been under your control continuously since the beginning of your most recent turn. Informally, it can’t have “summoning sickness.” However, the other Ally you tap can be one that just came under your control. (Note that tapping the second Ally doesn’t use {T} [the tap symbol].)

text: Cohort — {T}, Tap an untapped Ally you control: Discard a card. If you do, draw a card.
